definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: murmuring;—pl. cstr. [[תְּלֻנּוֹת]] ([[תְּלוּנּׁת]]) Ex 16:12 + 2 t.; sf. [[תְּלֻנּׁתֵיכֶם]] Ex 16:7 + 3 t.; [[תְּלוּנּׁתָם]] Nu 17:25; —murmurings of Isr. against ´[[י]] (only P); Ex 16:9, Ex 16:12, Nu 17:25; sq. [[עַל]] Ex 16:7, Ex 16:8, cf. v:Ex 16:8, Nu 14:27, Nu 17:5 ( + [[מַלִּינִם על]]).
